EmailTemplate.subject: New Home Energy Selections Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I am following up on my voicemail message left earlier regarding the scheduling of your SunPower solar energy consultation. As your builder’s solar provider, we want to ensure that you have been provided with the options available to start saving on your monthly bills as soon as you move in!
As I mentioned in my message, the next step is to schedule you for a quick 15 minute phone call with our Energy Consultants who will answer any questions and help you choose the SunPower® solar system that is right for your home.
To schedule an appointment, just give me a call or reply to this email with a few times that work for you. I’ll schedule the appointment and send you a confirmation email with the details.
I look forward to hearing from you soon!
Warmly,
Your SunPower Team 1-800-268-0331 SolarAdvisors@SunPower.com
P.S. We invite you to learn more about SunPower® home solar and how it’s transforming the way people generate the clean, renewable energy they need every day. Visit the SunPower Community and learn what others are saying about their switch to home solar.
Together, let’s change the way our world is powered.
